translations: 阿亚图拉（对伊朗等国伊斯兰教什叶派领袖的尊称）

sentences.sentence: The ayatollah will be hard to replace.
Some observers even compared the ayatollah with Mahatma Gandhi. Why not?
sentences.translation: 有些观察家甚至把阿雅德拉与圣雄甘地相提并论，为什么不可以呢？

sentences.sentence: Mr Turabi hoped to cast himself as an Ayatollah Khomeini of east Africa.
sentences.translation: 图拉比希望将自己塑造成东部非洲的阿亚图拉•霍梅尼。
